煠字的基本解释

煠
yè
火光；烧。

煠
zhá
同“炸2”。

煠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhá］
［《廣韻》士洽切，入洽，崇。］
(1)把食物放入汤或煮沸的油里弄熟。
(2)把物品放在沸油里进行处理。

煠字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煠； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页677第21
【廣韻】與涉切。【集韻】弋涉切，?音葉。【玉篇】爚也。　又【廣韻】丑輒切【集韻】敕涉切，?音鍤。義同。　又【廣韻】士洽切【集韻】實洽切，?音?。【廣韻】湯煠。【博雅】爚也。或作㴙。　【篇海】作?。

煠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
煠字的起名意思

火光。

煠
Basic explanation of words
煠
yè
Fire light; burn.
煠
zhá
Same as "Fried 2".
煠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhá］
["Guangyun" Shi Qiaqi, Enter Qia, Chong. ]
(1) Put the food in soup or boiling oil to cook.
(2) Put the items in boiling oil for processing.
煠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　煠; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 677 21
[Guang Yun] and She cut. [Jiyun] Yishe cut,? Yinye. 【Jade articles】Conversion.　[Guang Yun] Ugly Rhyme Cut [Ji Yun] Evil Sheep Cut,? Yin Deng. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Shi Qiaqi [Jiyun] Really consistent, "Yin?". [Guang Yun] Tang 煠. 【Bo Ya】Conversion. Or make 㴙.　【Pianhai】made?.
